text: «le’inanitemi ine zenidi ye’alahi gimija betochi alilu ruk’inimi ‘awik’alehu alilachihumi፡፡ inemi meli’aki nenyi alilachihumi፡፡ le’ineziyami ‘ayinochachihu lemiyawaridwachewi alahi degi negerini (iminetini) ayiset’achewimi alilimi፡፡ alahi benefisochachewi wisit’i yalewini negeri awak’i newi፡፡ ine yani gize kebedelenyochi ihonalehuna» (alachewi)፡፡
